text: I have set up authentication to upload files to a production site (been working from home on my laptop). The config file is in my bitbucket repository. Is the authentication token tied to a specific device? I've just pulled changed to my office desktop (using sourcetree) and am now trying to upload changes from that machine, but I'm getting 'The portalID XXXXXXX is missing authentication configuration'. Any ideas?

Hi James, this should work, can you DM me (do not post publicly) the content of your config file with any keys obfuscated with x's (i dont need to see the keys themselves I just want to verify that the format of your config file has no errors)
Is it possible to use the 'Expanded view' for richtext fields in custom modules?
As it is possible with the default 'Content module' for HubSpot
